statements: UPDATE luxury_properties SET price = 200000, bedrooms = 4 WHERE property_id = 101;
UPDATE luxury_properties SET location = 'Malibu', size_sqft = 3500 WHERE property_id = 102;
UPDATE luxury_properties SET price = 150000, bedrooms = 4 WHERE property_id = 101;
UPDATE luxury_properties SET location = 'New York', size_sqft = 3000, amenities = '{"pool": true, "gym": true}' WHERE property_id = 102;
UPDATE luxury_properties SET price = 1000000, location = 'New York' WHERE property_id = 12345;
UPDATE property_features SET has_pool = 1, has_gym = 0 WHERE property_id = 54321;
UPDATE luxury_properties SET price = 1500000, location = 'New York', bedrooms = 4 WHERE id = 101
UPDATE property_features SET feature = 'Swimming Pool', size = 1200, luxury_rating = 'High' WHERE property_id = 201
UPDATE luxury_properties SET price = 200000.00 WHERE property_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE property_reviews SET rating = 5, review_text = 'Amazing property with top-notch amenities' WHERE property_id = '98765432-1a2b-3c4d-5e6f-123456789012';
UPDATE luxury_properties SET price = 500000.00, property_type = 'Condo' WHERE property_id = 'cf9bf8f8-7b1d-4d1d-b3aa-e2c7cd5043b1';

UPDATE property_reviews SET reviewer_name = 'John Doe', rating = 5, review_text = 'Absolutely amazing property!', review_date = '2022-03-15 10:30:00' WHERE property_id = 'a9c2cab4-cd3a-408b-b8d4-33bd803317a2' AND review_id = '5c75fa6a-8d77-4fd1-bf6e-4b6d39c7f3d2';

UPDATE amenities SET description = 'Luxury spa services available' WHERE amenity_id = 3;
UPDATE luxury_properties SET price = 150000 WHERE property_id = 1;
UPDATE amenities SET description = 'Luxurious amenities with a stunning view' WHERE amenity_id = 2;
UPDATE Luxury_Property_Listings SET price = 1500000, bedrooms = 5 WHERE id = 1
